titles.title: Expressing condemnation of political violence and denouncing the attempted assassination of Former President Donald J. Trump.
Expressing condemnation of political violence and denouncing the attempted assassination of Former President Donald J. Trump.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This resolution condemns all forms of political violence and calls on U.S. government officials and politicians to condemn the attempted assassination of former President Donald J. Trump.
